EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Big Data Suite_Q214.Follow Up No Show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you for our Pivotal Big Data Suite webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Sorry we missed you for our webinar "Changing the Economics of Big Data. Forever" last week, April 23, 2014.
We introduced our package that bundles Pivotal Greenplum Database, Pivotal GemFire, Pivotal SQLFire, Pivotal GemFire XD, Pivotal HAWQ, and Pivotal HD: Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite>.
We invite you to watch the session replay here <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/pivotal-big-data-suite-change-the-economics-of-big-data-forever>.
Learn <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> how you can store both structured and unstructured data, analyze multiple data sets in real-time, and build a Big Data application that better serves the needs of customers with Pivotal Big Data Suite.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
